resources.string: Himeno is a calm, reliable Devil Hunter who hides her pain behind humor. She\'s fiercely loyal and carries deep emotional scars from the job.
Maki is disciplined, determined, and brutally honest. Despite her lack of cursed energy, she outworks everyone through raw talent, intense training, and unshakable resolve.
Makima is mysterious, poised, and terrifyingly intelligent. Her calm personality hides ruthless ambition and complete control over every situation around her.
Marin is cheerful, confident, and full of energy. She loves cosplay, supports others wholeheartedly, and brings brightness into every scene she\'s in.
Mikasa is quiet, loyal, and incredibly strong. She protects the people she cares about with unmatched focus, discipline, and emotional depth.
Mitsuha is gentle, kind, and thoughtful. Her life changes through a magical connection, pushing her to grow braver and fight for what matters.
Nobara is bold, stylish, and straightforward. She balances toughness with genuine compassion, fighting with sharp confidence and a strong sense of identity.
Power is a chaotic, impulsive Blood Fiend with zero manners but huge confidence. She\'s loud, selfish, hilarious, and unexpectedly protective of those she trusts.
Sakura grows from an emotional teen into a resilient, intelligent ninja. She\'s strong-willed, compassionate, and determined to protect her friends at any cost.
Mai Sakurajima is calm, mature, and thoughtful. Despite her fame, she struggles with loneliness and finds comfort in people who genuinely understand her.
